Name: Action
Description: Action film is a film genre in which the protagonist is thrust into a series of events that typically involve violence and physical feats.

Name: Sci-Fi
Description: Science fiction is a genre of speculative fiction which typically deals with imaginative and futuristic concepts such as advanced science and technology, space exploration, time travel, parallel universes, extraterrestrial life, sentient artificial intelligence, cybernetics, certain forms of immortality (like mind uploading), and the singularity.
